name: YouTube De-Crapifier
description:
Removes a *ton* of things from YouTube, including comments, sidebar, logo, footer, etc. This is great for people who just use YouTube to watch videos, not any of the social features that come with the site.

The best place to send me feedback is to email me at danielnr.com (replace "a" with "@"), or directly on the blog post at https://danielnr.com/release-user-style-youtube-de-crapifier/
additional_info:
== 2.1.3 ==
* Fixed min-width issue with watch7-main, possible once again to horizontally resize the window to the borders of the video

== 2.1.2 ==
* Fixed playlist showing aligned left
* Removed Subscribe button
* Fixed margin on player

== 2.1.1 ==
* Re-hid "Show More" button that magically showed up from comments section

== 2.1.0 ==
* Front page search bar actually centers vertically now

== 2.0.3 ==
* Fixed search bar extending when window is too narrow

== 2.0.2 ==
* Fixed compatibility with minor UI update

== 2.0.1 ==
* Removed surprise footer-container line across the screen

== 2.0 == 
* Now removes items from the front page, making it look like a search engine front page
* Cleaned up the search page

== 1.2.2 ==
* Added support for Playlist menus

== 1.2.1 ==
* Removes the "Got it!" notifications, like we really need those

== 1.2 ==
* Updated to support this horrendous new UI
* Page now doesn't have weird whitespace at the bottom; you should be able to resize up to right below the description container

== 1.1 ==
* Updated to support YouTube's new UI
* User avatar now shows (decided to keep it with the new UI, if it gets annoying I'll remove it

== 1.0 ==
* Initial Release
